Date of Travel: MARCH 2018
Airline: Air Europa Express
Livery: AE Express Standard Livery  
Route: LPA-FUE
Aircraft: ATR 72
Registration: EC-MSM
Flight Number: UX9431
Miles: 100
Airborne time: 0h27m
Notes: None
Cost to book: ¬£39, including seat selection. No hold luggage

Thanks for finding my video and pressing play!

This is my first Thursday video, and they‚Äôll be a weekly fixture in addition to Sunday reports going forward. In this video I take a teeny tiny trip between Las Palmas in Gran Canaria across to the next island in the Canaries, Fuerteventura. I travel with Air Europa Express on one of their ATR 72 aircraft. 

There‚Äôs not too much to remark on with such a short flight, but one thing which is a bit strange is the fact they played music in the cabin during landing. I‚Äôve experienced that only once before and I‚Äôm struggling to think which airline it was!

Next trip report is on Sunday (of course) and features my long-awaited Thomas Cook Economy Plus trip between Fuerteventura and Birmingham. 

If you want to find out more about my future plans and join in conversations I have about travel, follow me on Twitter: @pauls_trips. I‚Äôve started using it properly now and it would be great to see some of you there too.
